description: silhouettes of people seated at bottom center; other silhouettes of people on horseback and figures on shore; bridge with arches at center back
marks: Signature and Edition LRC, in black ink: [A Lepère]
provenance: [Judith L. Pillsbury, Paris, until 1998; set of 20 plates with frontispiece sold in May for AOOO to Drake]; Harry Drake, St. Paul (1998-d. 2012; bequeathed to MIA)
title: L'abreuvoir du Pont-Marie, plate 10 from "Le Long de la Seine et des Boulevards"
